Context:
The George Brown College has international partnerships with academic institutions that allow students to complete their degree or masterâ€™s program abroad through their international pathways (Outbound and Inbound Pathways). These opportunities are available for current George Brown students who wish to study abroad and for students from partner schools to come to George Brown. Interested students should contact the respective institution directly for up-to-date information on tuition costs, scholarship opportunities, and application processes. There are two types of international pathways: Outbound Pathways for students from George Brown going abroad, and Inbound Pathways for students joining George Brown from partner institutions.

For more information about the application process, application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, and campus tours, interested individuals can sign up on the website or contact George Brown College at 416-415-2000 (voice) or 1-877-515-5559 (TTY), or via email at ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

Please note that the information on this website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
